event.title: bertieCore
event.description: Core meta data that should be supplied with all data objects. Identify what the data is.

bertieVersion.description: The version of bertie schema data is compatible with

atrc.description: Anonymous cookie identifying this device or browser. Should be created on the server and persisted on the device.

contextFragment.description: Denotes whether the event is being transmitted singly and required combining with other events downstream for context.

sourceTraceId.description: traceId from originating application which allows for recombination separately transmitted events

sampleRate.description: Used alongside sampleReason to describe the rate of sampling used if not the norm for this application

sampleReason.description: Used alongside sampleRate to describe why sample rate is different to the norm for this application

country.description: Uppercase ISO country code descriptor for country to which this application is served

schema-error.title: bertieCore
schema-error.description: used in cases where the event does not conform to the expected schema

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

accountOp.description: Actions associated with an account such as loggin in

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

interactionType.description: defines the type of interaction that occurred

customerData.description: Holds data defining a customer or user account

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

UUID.description: UUID of the customer from Identity service

legacyId.description: ID of a local or legacy system that may be relevant to the digital property

userRole.description: Description of the users role as interpreted and actioned by the application UI. Only relevant if the UI gives a different experience for different user groups.

activeOrders.description: The number of orders currently pending delivery/collection that are still able to be amended/altered.

authenticatedLogin.description: Identifies if user is currently authenticated

authenticationMethod.description: Identifies the method used to authenticate

authenticatedVerified.description: Identifies if user has completed additional 2 layer verification

verificationType.description: Identifies the method used to verify the account

amendMode.description: Identifies if user is currently amending an order

amendStart.description: Identifies the page load/screen load at which a user first enters amend mode

firstTimeShopperLocal.description: Identifies if the user is placing an order for the first time on this business unit. Should remain 'true' on order confirmation.

firstTimeShopperGlobal.description: Identifies if the user is placing an order for the first time across all of Tesco estate. Should remain 'true' on order confirmation.

segment.description: Defines the customer level segments that this customer is currently part of

subscription.title: subscription
subscription.description: Descibes which subscriptions this customer has against their account

totalSubs.description: count of the number of subscriptions that this customer has active

deliverySaver.description: data about the delivery saver subscription

clubcardPlus.description: data about the Clubcard Plus subscription

planStatus.description: the status of the current plan

benefit.description: contains information about benefits contained in the plan

clubcard.description: holds information about a clubcard account

member.description: whether the customer is currently enroled in Clubcard

voucherBalance.description: the total value of vouchers available to be spent

totalPoints.description: the total number of Clubcard points against this customers account

availablePoints.description: the number of Clubcard points available to use on this customers account

remainingDays.description: days remaining for this benefit to be redeemed

basicOp.description: Used to capture simple interactions of interest or value

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

feature.description: a low level descriptor for this interaction

component.description: a high level descriptor for this interaction

isDeferred.description: identifies whether this interaction needs to be captured in a separate call or rolled into the following page call

contextValue.description: allows an additional piece of contextual data to be added e.g. an order ID

pageData.description: Holds data defining the page/screen the user is currently viewing. Should be called on all page/screen loads or transitions affecting the majority of the screen

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

pageTitle.description: Title of the current page/screen. Can be formed from the dynamic portion of url if it is meaningful

pageType.description: Logical or functional group that this page/screen belongs to

category.description: Category info for the current page/screen

pageURL.description: URL or identifying path of the current page/screen including parameters

pageReferer.description: contents of the referer header on browsers

preservedReferer.description: stored contents of referrer used to persist referrer for single pageview after cookie preferences are submitted

pageLanguage.description: Language of the current page/screen as produced by the site

pageNumber.description: Page number of the current page/screen. Only used on listing screens with multiple screens of products

pageIntent.description: Wider level intention behind this page or action. Used in cases where multiple areas of functionality are brought together into a single platform.

searchData.description: Holds search related data of the page loaded. Should be called on all search results pageload/screen changes

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

searchOutput.description: keyword used by engine to generate results e.g. spelling errors corrected

matchType.description: method used by the engine to return the results

engine.description: engine used to generate the search results

engineVersion.description: version of the engine used to generate the search results

isActive.description: denotes if this view of a search results page is the result of an active search or just navigational

mulitsearchListCount.description: the number of items in the users search list when inputType is multi item

mulitsearchListPosition.description: the position of the item the list of searched items when inputType is multi item

filterOp.description: captures data about interactions with sort and filters

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

interactionType.description: captures data about interactions with sort and filters

sortFilter.description: Captures info about filters that are currently applied

filterData.description: set on page load/screen change or called by another component

filter.description: Defines a set of state flags for this customer

brand.description: Defines a set of brand filters applied to content

attribute.description: Defines a set of attribute filters applied to content

category.description: Defines a set of category filters applied to content

curated.description: Defines a set of customisable filters applied to content.

dietary.description: Defines a set of dietary filters applied to content

items.description: Defines dietary filters applied to content

renderedExperimentOp.description: holds information about mvt experiments that are loaded

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

items.description: holds information about a single experiment

experimentName.description: identifies the experiment that is running

variationKey.description: identifies the variant within the experiment

renderedContentOp.description: Holds data defining the contents of the page loaded

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

resultCountForPage.description: The grid size of the page - number of products that can be displayed on this page if all positions are filled

itemsRangeStart.description: The start of range of products rendered on this page - based on what is actually there. E.g. second page of 26 results with 24 in view would be '25'

itemsRangeEnd.description: The end of range of products rendered on this page - based on what is actually there. E.g. second page of 26 results with 24 in view would be '26'

listSize.description: The full number of results for this list - If you could view all results on a single page, how many there would be.

items.description: holds information about a component, contain container or area of content

modulePosition.description: Denotes where on the page the module is positioned. Counted from top to bottom and left to right

displayArea.description: short code to describe the type of module

pageType.description: identifies the page that this request is associated with

componentId.description: Id at the level of the component

componentType.description: Denotes the engine powering the content. r = rich relevance, t = trex, c = content (magnolia), d = dunnhumby, s = standard (regular product content), p = personalised

componentName.description: Name for this content where relevant

buylistId.description: Id for the underlying buylist related to this component

impressedContentOp.description: Holds data defining the contents in view

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

itemsRangeStart.description: The start of range of products rendered in this view - based on what is actually there. E.g. second page of 26 results with 24 in view would be '25'

itemsRangeEnd.description: The end of range of products rendered in this view - based on what is actually there. E.g. second page of 26 results with 24 in view would be '26'

items.title: content
items.description: holds information about a component, contain container or area of content

modulePosition.description: Denotes where on the page the module is positioned. Counted from top to bottom and left to right

displayArea.description: short code to describe the type of module

pageType.description: identifies the page that this request is associated with

componentId.description: Id at the level of the component

componentType.description: Denotes the engine powering the content. r = rich relevance, t = trex, c = content (magnolia), d = dunnhumby, s = standard (regular product content), , p = personalised

componentName.description: Name for this content where relevant

buylistId.description: Id for the underlying buylist related to this component

contentInteractOp.description: captures data about interactions with page contents

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

contextValue.description: additional value to give context to the interaction

content.description: details of the content being interacted with

modulePosition.description: Denotes where on the page the module is positioned. Counted from top to bottom and left to right

displayArea.description: short code to describe the type of module

pageType.description: identifies the page that this request is associated with

componentId.description: Id at the level of the component

componentType.description: Denotes the engine powering the content. r = rich relevance, t = trex, c = content (magnolia), d = dunnhumby, s = standard (regular product content), , p = personalised

componentName.description: Name for this content where relevant

buylistId.description: Id for the underlying buylist related to this component

contentData.description: Holds data defining the contents of the modules and products on a page

campaignId.description: Campaign id for this content, kept below 30 characters

posInModule.description: Denotes the position of this item within the module

contentFlag.description: Signals from CMS that are relevant e.g. for personalisation. Comma delimited string if multiple

ruleId.description: Denotes the rules in CMS powering the content

contentSegment.description: Defines the customer level segments that this customer is currently part of

category.description: taxonomy data related to this module if relevant

personalisationModel.description: information related to personalisation of product

primaryAdId.description: primary id to measure performance of this piece of content

secondaryAdId.description: secondary id to measure performance of this piece of content

basketOp.description: carries data surrounding an interaction with the basket

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

listInteraction.description: describes the method of interaction with a stored list

secondBasketId.description: identifier for secondary basket in cases where more than 1 basket is active concurrently

status.description: status of the basket when there are multiple concurrent baskets

basketFullness.description: indicates whether a basket is within limit or in breach of fullness restrictions (weight, volume and similar)

identifier.description: identifies the part of the page where the interaction occurred.
examples: basket empty, page, side basket, carousel:<carousel name>, substitution, background etc

contextValue.description: a value to give greater additional context to the event, for example an Ad id for a sponsored product.

position.description: describes the position of the product on the page grid or within the module it is presented in

totalProducts.description: count of the total number of units of all products within the current basket

uniqueProducts.description: count of the total number of unique product SKUs within the current basket

anonymous.description: denotes this interaction was undertaken whilst user was not logged in, and was completed after user successfully logged in

isOpen.description: denotes whether this interaction was the first towards this basketId or first item into the basket

basketData.description: contains all data relating to the currently active basket

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

secondBasketId.description: identifier for secondary basket in cases where more than 1 basket is active concurrently

guidePrice.description: guide price of current basket restricted to 2 decimal places

basketFullPrice.description: total price of all items in basket, restricted to 2 decimal places

totalProducts.description: count of the total number of units of all products within the current basket

uniqueProducts.description: count of the total number of unique product SKUs within the current basket

basketFullness.description: indicates whether a basket is within limit or in breach of fullness restrictions (weight, volume and similar)

offerBasket.description: contains information about discounts affecting the entire basket

multibuyOffer.description: details of any multi-product offer applied to the basket

discount.description: savings due to redeeming this offer OR points gained

discountType.description: The way in which the offer is applied

percentage.description: the numeric value between 0 and 1 denoting the percentage value saved.

coupon.description: Details of coupons currently fitted to basket

numberOfSlots.description: number of deliveries this basket will be fulfilled by

status.description: status of the basket when there are multiple concurrent baskets

orderData.description: Should be called on all pageload screen load of order or amend confirmation pages

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

secondaryReference.description: secondary reference for this order for linking to alternative systems

supplier.description: the supplier for this delivery if not Tesco

flag.description: flags associated with this order, used to carry additional relevant contextual info

amendedProducts.description: Contains data relating to the changes made to an order during the latest amendment

couponOp.description: captures data about interactions with coupons

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

interactionType.description: describes whether the interaction was to add or remove the coupon

couponType.description: The variety of coupon based on its source

discount.description: savings due to redeeming this offer OR points gained

discountType.description: The way in which the coupon is applied - val = fixed value change, pct = percentage change, points = clubcard points

percentage.description: The numeric value between 0 and 1 denoting the percentage value saved to 2 dps - only needed if discountType = pct

slotOp.description: Carries data related to interactions with delivery slots

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

interactionType.description: identifies if the interaction was to book or unbook a slot

store.description: Information about the store or location being displayed

currentSlot.description: carries data about the slot interacted with

impressedSlotOp.description: contains all data relating the slots grid

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

store.description: Information about the store or location being displayed

items.description: carries data about the slot in the grid

slotData.description: contains delivery and charges information applicable to this basket or order

slotStart.description: date & time of beginning of delivery slot

slotEnd.description: date & time of end of delivery slot

isExpired.description: denotes whether the current slot has expired

isAvailable.description: denotes whether the slot is available to be booked

isTradable.description: denotes whether the slot is tradable on this store id

daysFromToday.description: describes how many whole calendars days from today the slot is. Today would be 0, tomorrow 1 etc.

deliverySaver.description: holds details relating to delivery saver subscription

discount.description: details of any savings as a result of being a delivery saver subscriber

basketId.description: ID for this basket from customerOrder (order_id), generated as soon as the basket exists

productOp.description: describes an interaction to query, update, output (or similar) information pertaining to a product

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

interactionType.description: describes the purpose of the request being made

inputType.description: describes the method by which the product was input for the request

inputInfoType.description: provides additional information about the data being input

request.description: information sent or returned in relation to the product that is relevant to the interaction

primaryId.description: primary product id used on this digital property

secondaryId.description: secondary product id used on this digital property

sellerId.description: id for the seller of this product

sellerCategory.description: category for the seller of this product

personalisationModel.description: information related to personalisation of product

primaryAdId.description: primary adId related to sponsored products

availability.description: availability status code for this product

singlePrice.description: price of a single unit of this product

singleWeight.description: weight of a single unit of this product

quantity.description: quantity of this product in the given context

productMethod.description: method by which this product is measured (weight or quantity)

isFavourite.description: indicates whether this product is in this customer's favourites list

seedProduct.description: describes the parent or seed product if such a relationship exists e.g. substitutions

seedLookup.description: identifies the lookup used to retrieve the seed product

attribute.description: defines additional attributes of this product

rating.description: holds information from ratings and reviews

averageRating.description: the average rating of this product at the point it is displayed

noOfRatings.description: the number of reviews for this product

secondaryReference.description: used when a product is attributed an id or reference from another system which does not replace the primary id for the product

primaryId.description: primary product id used on this digital property

secondaryId.description: secondary product id used on this digital property

sellerId.description: id for the seller of this product

personalisationModel.description: information related to personalisation of product

primaryAdId.description: primary adId related to sponsored products

availability.description: availability status code for this product

singlePrice.description: price of a single unit of this product

singleWeight.description: weight of a single unit of this product

quantity.description: quantity of this product in the given context

productMethod.description: method by which this product is measured (weight or quantity)

isFavourite.description: indicates whether this product is in this customer's favourites list

seedProduct.description: describes the parent or seed product if such a relationship exists e.g. substitutions

seedLookup.description: identifies the lookup used to retrieve the seed product

attribute.description: defines additional attributes of this product

rating.description: holds information from ratings and reviews

averageRating.description: the average rating of this product at the point it is displayed

noOfRatings.description: the number of reviews for this product

secondaryReference.description: used when a product is attributed an id or reference from another system which does not replace the primary id for the product

qtyChange.description: the quantity of units added or removed in this interaction. Value should be negative on removes.

totalPriceChange.description: total price for all units of this product added or removed. Value should be negative on removes.

totalWeightChange.description: total change in weight as a result of this interactions. Value should be negative on removes.

offerPrice.description: single unit offer price of this product

discount.description: The difference in cost for a single unit of this product on and off offer OR the number of points gained

discountType.description: The way in which the offer is applied

percentage.description: the numeric value between 0 and 1 denoting the percentage value saved

offerMet.description: identifies whether the conditions for this offer have been met

inSlot.description: describes whether the offer is valid for the customer's current delivery / collection slot

productAttribute.description: Defines a set of attributes associated with a product

platformData.description: Holds data defining the digital property or application the user is currently interacting with

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

application.description: The current environment for this application

property.description: denotes the digital property or data source <propertyid>:<country>:<platform type>:<os (apps)|'browser'(web)>:<responsive type>:<application>

country.description: the country code of the site

built.description: date when this build was released or submitted to app store

device.description: Holds information about the device being used

breakPoint.description: Friendly term indicating the formfactor of the property being viewed

deviceId.description: ID for this device. Not to be captured for customer-owned devices

triggerFunction.description: Describes a trigger for another platform or tool to respond to

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

functionValue.description: provides additional information about the function

bertieType.description: The type name of the data being presented

error.description: captures basic data about errors generated in the user interface

message.description: error message displayed to user or friendly text for error
examples: sorry this account has not been recognised

errorType.description: describes the type of error at a high level

interactionType.description: describes the type of user interaction

timeStamp.description: ISO 8601 Format for timestamps UTC time. Can use local time + offset e.g. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.sssHH:MM or Zulu time e.g. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.sssZ

slotTime.description: Time to closest minute in time zone of delivery YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM

catFriendlyLevel.description: friendly name for this category level

price.description: Contains price information for an item
price of item limited to 2 decimal places

weightMeasure.description: unit of measure for this product

segment.description: Defines the segment that this customer or content is a part of

storeData.description: Information about a store or location

storeId.description: Store branch Id from location service

locationId.description: Store Location Id from location service

attribute.description: Defines a set of attributes associated with a product

flag.description: describes one flag for this order

mediaData.description: holds additional info specific to media

catalogueCountry.description: Uppercase ISO country code descriptor for Media audience catalogue

secondBasketId.description: identifier for secondary basket in cases where more than 1 basket is active concurrently
